entry.title: Contribute translation for Mutto!
entry.content:
It’s welcome to contribute translation to your own country!

Mutto and me thanks you a lot!

Whether it’s in need

First of all, you need to check out this project on GitHub, to see whether you need add or compelete your country’s language.

After your confirming, you can start to add your language with this post!

How to contribute

The table of country code

af Public Dutch

af-ZA Public Dutch-South Africa

sq-AL Albania-Albania

entry.title: 制作您的 Mutto 站点规则
Hello World
entry.content:
Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub.

Quick Start

Create a new post

More info: Writing

Run server

More info: Server

Generate static files

More info: Generating

Deploy to remote sites

More info: Deployment
